sentences.en: Eric's sister had nobly volunteered to help with the gardening.
sentences.cn: 埃里克的姐姐真好，自告奋勇帮助收拾花园。

sentences.en: Gardening is very popular in Britain.
sentences.cn: 园艺在英国非常受欢迎。

sentences.en: He parted with much of his collection to pay his gardening bills.
sentences.cn: 他卖掉了大部分藏品来付园艺费。

sentences.en: He was trained for gardening at the Agricultural College.
Her hobbies include swimming and gardening.
His only experience of gardening so far proved immensely satisfying.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止他唯一的一次园艺经历非常令人满意。

sentences.en: I have taken up gardening again.
sentences.cn: 我又开始干起了园艺活。

sentences.en: I might do a bit of gardening this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午我可能会干些园艺活。

sentences.en: I think the young man is getting interested in gardening.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个年轻人开始对园艺产生兴趣了。

sentences.en: I've definitely been bitten by the gardening bug.
Is he any good at gardening? We might experiment with him.
sentences.cn: 他擅长园艺 吗 ?我们可以试试他.

sentences.en: She had a passion for gardening.
She handed in her resignation and was put on three months' gardening leave.
sentences.cn: 她交上辞呈后，却得到了三个月的园艺假。

sentences.en: the English love affair with gardening
sentences.cn: 英格兰人对园艺的热爱

sentences.en: Tomorrow I'll treat myself to a day's gardening.
sentences.cn: 明天我将犒劳一下自己——享受一天的园艺乐趣。

sentences.en: Unfortunately I'm not suitably dressed for gardening.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我的着装不适合做园艺活。

trans.tran_en: the activity of working in a garden, growing plants, cutting a lawn etc
